writer.name: 汀治·克里希南 Tinge Krishnan

director.name: 汀治·克里希南 Tinge Krishnan

introduction: Sophie plays the piano. To her, it’s probably the best thing in life – even though her teacher isn’t always enamoured of her approach to playing the instrument. Unbeknown to Sophie, her boyfriend – rap fan Danko – has submitted one of her recordings to a renowned music competition. It even gets her into the final. But when Sophie appears on stage the jury is gob - smacked by her performance. Where on earth did Danko get the recordings he sent to the pre-selection committee?
